comments: Ratu was reported by two other students for repeatedly teasing and pushing them during recess. When approached, he was disrespectful to the teacher on duty.
actionComments: Parents were called in for a meeting. Ratu has been given a 2-day in-school suspension and must write an apology letter to the students he bullied.

comments: Sereana was absent for 3 consecutive days without any notification from her parents.
actionComments: Multiple calls were made to the parents with no response. A home visit has been scheduled with the Head Teacher.
